changeSet.author: elitecore

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBLMSERVICETYPE WHERE TYPE = 'Http2 Collection Service';

changeSet.comment: Adding Http2 Collection Service in TBLMSERVICETYPE
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMSERVICETYPE(ID,CREATEDBYSTAFFID,CREATEDDATE,LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID,LASTUPDATEDDATE, STATUS,ALIAS,TYPEOFSERVICE,DESCRIPTION,SERVICEFULLCLASSNAME,TYPE,SERVICECATEGORY) VALUES((SELECT MAX(ID)+1 FROM TBLMSERVICETYPE as id),1,now(),1,now(), 'ACTIVE','HTTP2_COLLECTION_SERVICE','MAIN','Http2 Collection Service','com.elitecore.sm.services.model.Http2CollectionService', 'Http2 Collection Service','ONLINE');

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.comment: Inserting new data required for HTTP2_COLLECTION_SERVICE in 'PUBLIC.TBLTPROFILENTITY' table
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLTPROFILENTITY(ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE, STATUS, ENTITYALIAS, ENTITYTYPE, ISDEFAULT, SERVERTYPEID) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(ID+1) FROM TBLTPROFILENTITY),1, SYSDATE, 1,SYSDATE, 'INACTIVE','HTTP2_COLLECTION_SERVICE','SERVICE_TYPE', 'Y', 1); UPDATE TBLTPRIMARYKEY SET VALUE=(SELECT MAX(ID+1) FROM TBLTPROFILENTITY) WHERE TABLE_NAME='ProfileEntity';

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.comment: Inserting new data required for HTTP2_COLLECTION_SERVICE in 'PUBLIC.TBLTPROFILENTITY' table
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLTPROFILENTITY(ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE, STATUS, ENTITYALIAS, ENTITYTYPE, ISDEFAULT, SERVERTYPEID) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(ID+1) FROM TBLTPROFILENTITY AS T),1, now(), 1,now(), 'INACTIVE','HTTP2_COLLECTION_SERVICE','SERVICE_TYPE', 'Y', 1); UPDATE TBLTPRIMARYKEY SET VALUE=(SELECT MAX(ID+1) FROM TBLTPROFILENTITY ) WHERE TABLE_NAME='ProfileEntity';

changeSet.author: elitecore

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBLTPROFILENTITY WHERE ISDEFAULT='N' and ENTITYALIAS='HTTP2_COLLECTION_SERVICE';

changeSet.comment: Adding HTTP2_COLLECTION_SERVICE into list where license already exists
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLTPROFILENTITY( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE,LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, ENTITYALIAS, ENTITYTYPE,ISDEFAULT,SERVERTYPEID,LICENSEID) select (select max(id+1) from TBLTPROFILENTITY), 0,SYSDATE, 0, SYSDATE,'INACTIVE','HTTP2_COLLECTION_SERVICE','SERVICE_TYPE','N',1, (select max(id) from tbltlicense where componenttype = 'SERVER_MANAGER') from dual where EXISTS (select 1 from tbltlicense where componenttype = 'SERVER_MANAGER' having max(id) > 0)

changeSet.author: elitecore

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLTPROFILENTITY( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE,LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, ENTITYALIAS, ENTITYTYPE,ISDEFAULT,SERVERTYPEID,LICENSEID) select (select max(id+1) from TBLTPROFILENTITY as t), 0,now(), 0, now(),'INACTIVE','HTTP2_COLLECTION_SERVICE','SERVICE_TYPE','N',1, (select max(id) from TBLTLICENSE as l where componenttype = 'SERVER_MANAGER') from dual where EXISTS (select 1 from TBLTLICENSE as t1 where componenttype = 'SERVER_MANAGER' having max(id) > 0)

changeSet.author: strlite
changeSet.comment: update all pathlist's rows for circle id column value equal to 1 if value is null
changeSet.sql: UPDATE TBLTPATHLIST SET CIRCLEID=1 WHERE CIRCLEID IS NULL;

changeSet.author: sterlite
changeSet.comment: Adding new regex for KafkaDataSourceConfig.name regex ^[\w@_:.][\w\s@_:.]{1,250}+$
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMREGEX( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, DESCRIPTION, ENTITY, REGEXKEY, VALUE) VALUES ((select (max(ID)+1) as num from TBLMREGEX), 1,SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE,'ACTIVE', 'Name', 'KafkaDataSourceConfig','KafkaDataSourceConfig.name','^[\w@_:.][\w\s@_:.]{1,250}+$');
changeSet.comment: Adding new regex for KafkaDataSourceConfig.kafkaServerPort regex -1|([0-9]{0,10})$
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMREGEX( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, DESCRIPTION, ENTITY, REGEXKEY, VALUE) VALUES ((select (max(ID)+1) as num from TBLMREGEX), 1,SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE,'ACTIVE', 'Kafka Server Port', 'KafkaDataSourceConfig','KafkaDataSourceConfig.kafkaServerPort','-1|([0-9]{0,10})$');
changeSet.comment: Adding new regex for KafkaDataSourceConfig.maxRetryCount regex -1|([0-9]{0,10})$
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMREGEX( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, DESCRIPTION, ENTITY, REGEXKEY, VALUE) VALUES ((select (max(ID)+1) as num from TBLMREGEX), 1,SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE,'ACTIVE', 'Max Retry Count', 'KafkaDataSourceConfig','KafkaDataSourceConfig.maxRetryCount','-1|([0-9]{0,10})$');
changeSet.comment: Adding new regex for KafkaDataSourceConfig.maxResponseWait regex -1|([0-9]{0,10})$
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMREGEX( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, DESCRIPTION, ENTITY, REGEXKEY, VALUE) VALUES ((select (max(ID)+1) as num from TBLMREGEX), 1,SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE,'ACTIVE', 'Max Response Wait', 'KafkaDataSourceConfig','KafkaDataSourceConfig.maxResponseWait','-1|([0-9]{0,10})$');
changeSet.comment: Adding new regex for KafkaDataSourceConfig.kafkaProducerRetryCount regex -1|([0-9]{0,10})$
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMREGEX( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, DESCRIPTION, ENTITY, REGEXKEY, VALUE) VALUES ((select (max(ID)+1) as num from TBLMREGEX), 1,SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE,'ACTIVE', 'Kafka Producer Retry Count', 'KafkaDataSourceConfig','KafkaDataSourceConfig.kafkaProducerRetryCount','-1|([0-9]{0,10})$');

changeSet.comment: Adding new regex for KafkaDataSourceConfig.kafkaProducerRetryBackoff regex -1|([0-9]{0,10})$
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMREGEX( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, DESCRIPTION, ENTITY, REGEXKEY, VALUE) VALUES ((select (max(ID)+1) as num from TBLMREGEX), 1,SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE,'ACTIVE', 'Kafka Producer Retry Backoff', 'KafkaDataSourceConfig','KafkaDataSourceConfig.kafkaProducerRetryBackoff','-1|([0-9]{0,10})$');

changeSet.comment: inserting json parser in 'TBLMPLUGINTYPE' table
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMPLUGINTYPE (ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE, STATUS, ALIAS, CATEGORY, DESCRIPTION, PLUGINFULLCLASSNAME, TYPE) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(ID+1) FROM TBLMPLUGINTYPE), 1, SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE, 'ACTIVE', 'JSON_PARSING_PLUGIN', 'Parser', 'Description : caters to json format', 'com.elitecore.sm.parser.model.JSONParser', 'JSON Parser'); UPDATE TBLTPRIMARYKEY SET VALUE = (SELECT MAX(ID+1) FROM TBLMPLUGINTYPE) WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'PluginTypeMaster';
